SELECT j.id, j.job_category_id, jc.title AS job_category_title, j.title AS job_title, j.description, j.desire_date_time, j.place,
CASE WHEN wl.job_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS LIKE_FLG, CASE WHEN wh.job_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS HELP_FLG FROM jobs j INNER JOIN job_categories jc ON j.job_category_id = jc.id AND jc.active = TRUE
LEFT OUTER JOIN worker_likes wl ON j.id = wl.job_id AND wl.worker_id = #{workerId} LEFT OUTER JOIN worker_helps wh ON j.id = wh.job_id AND wh.worker_id = #{workerId} LEFT OUTER JOIN tag_job_idxs tji ON j.id = tji.job_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN tags t ON tji.tag_id = t.id AND t.active = TRUE WHERE j.active = TRUE
ORDER BY j.updated_at DESC
